5 12 70
  This menu item provides the user with a possibility  to chose 
a momentum distribution for the first/second incoming particle. 
The name of activated distribution is displayed in the corresponding 
menu record. The "OFF" record  means that the convolution of matrix
element with a distribution function does not performed.
  The user has a possibility to display a plot for the highlighted
distribution  by pressing the F7 functional key.
